coref_content: 2:01am EDT Inox Wind Ltd : have bag an order for a 100 mw wind power project at Lahori, in the state of Madhya Pradesh from Ostro Energy. say Ostro Energy be bake by Actis, a global pan - emerge maket private equity frim with $ 7.6 bln of fund under management ..
tweets_content:
just In: Inox Wind Bags 100 MW Order From Ostro Energy.
Inox Wind Says: Will Be Responsible For Entire Project Lifecycle.
Inox Wind Says: 100 MW Project Will Be A Part Of Inox Wind Park 200 MW Capacity At Lahori.
INOXWIND - Inox Wind Bags 100 MW Order from OSTRO Energy.
First On CNBC-TV18 Inox Wind: Have Bagged 100 MW Order From Ostro Energy.
First On CNBC-TV18 Inox Wind: Order Book Increases To 1,250 MW Post Ostro Energy Order.
First On CNBC-TV18 Inox Wind: Expect To Complete Ostro Energy Order By March 2016.
First On CNBC-TV18 Inox Wind: 100 MW Order Bagged From Ostro Energy Is Worth Rs 600-650 Cr.
Dutch railway to run on 100% wind energy by 2018.
Inox Wind bags 100 MW power project from Ostro Energy.
A 50 MW offshore wind energy project is currently on and under assessment: Piyush Goyal..
Offshore Policy will open #opportunities in medium term: INOX Wind.
Do not see #pilot project coming up before 3-5 years: INOX Wind.
just In: Suzlon Energy Bags 105 MW Turnkey Orders: Suzlon Energy 20.70 Unch.
Inox Wind wins 50 mw Turnkey order from GMDC..
